title: By 2035, EVs to consume 6 to 8.7 pc of India's electricity: Report
description: The electric vehicles (EVs) in India are set to consume a significant share of the country's electricity by 2035, highlighted a report by IKIGAI Asset Manager Holdings, an investment management firm.
